a1: You can crop, resize, rotate, flip, adjust brightness/contrast/saturation, and compress your images. Operations can be applied in sequence â€” for example, crop first, then resize, then compress the result.
a2: You can edit JPG, PNG, WebP, GIF, BMP, SVG, HEIC and AVIF images. When downloading, choose between JPG, PNG and WebP output formats with adjustable quality.
q3: Is my image uploaded to a server?
a3: No. All processing happens directly in your browser using Canvas API and WebAssembly codecs. Your images never leave your device.
